thread.section_title: Vermont Farm Table Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vermont Farm Table | vermontfarmtable.com
thread.title: elisa
thread.title_full: Vermont Farm Table reviewed by elisa

author: elisa
title: elisa
text: Such a great experience purchasing our table from VFT! Not only is the table itself beautifully crafted and so high quality, but the owners were incredibly helpful throughout the decision making process and very responsive with answers to my questions, additional photos etc. Could not recommend a vendor more highly!
